content.question: Which of the following is most likely to inhibit democratization in Nigeria?

choices.label: Competitive elections, which tends to pit one group of people against another
Diversity, which tends to cause unequal treatment of citizens
Universal suffrage, which tends to give uninformed people voting rights
Political corruption, which tends to undermine rule of law

content.answer: Political corruption, which tends to undermine rule of law

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
